H3.text: what year did the baltimore ravens win superbowl. 2000 NFL season

A4.text: The game was played on January 28, 2001, at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida, making it the first time Raymond James Stadium held a Super Bowl.

A5.text: The Ravens defeated the Giants to win their first championship in franchise history.
